Original_Text: LONDON - Manchester United staged a thrilling comeback to win the game 3-2 against Liverpool in extra time.
MIAMI - The Heat dominated the game with a 110-95 victory over the Celtics, led by LeBron James' triple-double.
SYDNEY - The Australian cricket team secured a decisive win in the final game of the Ashes series.
NEW YORK - The Yankees clinched the division title in a tense game against the Red Sox, ending 5-4.
PARIS - The French Open saw an intense game where Nadal outlasted Federer in a five-set thriller.
TOKYO - The Japanese women's soccer team won the game 2-0, advancing to the Olympic quarterfinals.
RIO DE JANEIRO - Brazil's volleyball team excelled in the game, sweeping Argentina in straight sets.
CHICAGO - The Bulls pulled off a stunning upset in the game, defeating the Lakers in overtime.
MELBOURNE - The Grand Prix was a high-octane game, with Hamilton taking pole position in record time.
BERLIN - The German national team dominated the game, scoring four goals in the first time period.
